DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare clinical efficacy , incidence ventral epidural spread provocation concordant paresthesia , amount radiation exposure total procedure time transforaminal parasagittal interlaminar epidural injection .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Transforaminal vs. Parasagittal Interlaminar Epidural Injection
DOC.detailed_description: Participants randomly allocate receive either parasagittal interlaminar transforaminal ESI . Investigators obtain clinical data include age , gender , duration symptom , predominant symptom ( axial pain vs. leg pain ) , severity neurogenic intermittent claudication ( NIC ) degree depression . Depression assess Korean version Beck Depression Inventory ( BDI ) . The BDI standardize questionnaire ass cognitive , affective , somatic symptom depression . All data obtain perform ESI.Data anterior epidural spread presence concordant pain provocation obtain fluoroscopic guided parasagittal interlaminar transforaminal ESI . Also total procedure time amount radiation exposure check . Investigators observe epidural spread pattern 2 ml injection contrast material , confirm anterior epidural spread lateral view , ask participant concordant pain provocation . The participant ask pain distribution original pain ( concordant ) dissimilar absent quality location . Investigators use numerical rating scale ( NRS ) well Korean version Oswestry Disability Index ( ODI ) evaluate clinical efficacy term reduce pain functional improvement pretreatment 2 week ESI series . ESI perform twice 2 week interval final treatment outcome evaluation NRS ODI . All patient report average severity symptoms previous 1 week . A score 0 NRS represent pain , score 10 represent bad pain imaginable . The Korean version ODI ( 0-50 ) use assess functional improvement .
DOC.criteria: central spinal stenosis herniated nucleus pulposus . Lateral spinal stenosis Internal disc disruption
